title: Tjabba Thai Restaurang
text: Website for a thai restaurant in Stockholm. The website is built using one.comâ€™s website builder in order to keep it simple for the owner of the restaurant to make changes on their own. I created a new logotype, developed a cohesive visual identity including layout, typography and color scheme.

title: Web Museum
text: A web museum showcasing various artworks. Created using the Art Institute of Chicago API.
